DOC.brief_summary: This 96 week study determine UK- 453,061 combination Truvada efficacious , safe tolerable efavirenz combination Truvada HIV-1 infect patient previously treat antiretroviral drug .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of Different Doses Of UK-453 , 061 Plus Truvada Compared To Efavirenz Plus Truvada In Patients Who Have Not Been Previously Treated For HIV-1
DOC.mesh_term: Emtricitabine , Tenofovir Disoproxil Fumarate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Male female least 18 year age available followup period least 96 week . HIV 1 RNA viral load great 1,000 copies/mL Negative urine pregnancy test . Suspected document active , untreated HIV1 related opportunist infection condition require acute therapy time randomization . Subjects acute Hepatitis B and/or C within 30 day randomization . Absolute CD4 count < 200 cells/mm3 .
